quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: For the new fashion, Agostine want make a collaboration with Lora Tay, you need to talk to that to Lora Tay.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay want know what planned Agostine, Talk to this to Agostine.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Agostine dreaming about a beautiful dress, he need the help of Lora Tay for made this dress. You have some materials to show to Lora Tay.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay accept to help Agostine about the dress, but she need some silk cocoon.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay need you for retrieve the design to Agostine.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: You have the dress's folio of Agostine, bring it to Lora Tay.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora tay finish the dress. Be patient, wait few time and talk to her.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: The dress are not finish, Agostine has to finish the edges with cloth, gring it to him.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Agostine need some cotton cloths to finish this master piece.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: The dress is finish, Agostine can sell you this magnifient dress for 20,000 GP.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: The most beautiful dress of this world is for you, congratz.
